title: Aptitude Test: Logical Reasoning
description: Practice logical reasoning questions for placement tests

questions.question: If all roses are flowers and some flowers fade quickly, then:
questions.explanation: We know roses are flowers, but we don't know if roses are among the flowers that fade quickly.

questions.question: What comes next in the series: 2, 6, 12, 20, 30, ?
questions.explanation: The pattern is: +4, +6, +8, +10, so next is +12. 30 + 12 = 42.

questions.question: A train travels 120 km in 2 hours. How long will it take to travel 180 km at the same speed?
If today is Monday, what day will it be after 25 days?
questions.explanation: 25 days = 3 weeks + 4 days. Monday + 4 days = Friday.

questions.question: Find the odd one out: Apple, Banana, Carrot, Orange
questions.explanation: Carrot is a vegetable, while others are fruits.
